show_name: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes (TV)
plot: Ryner Lute is a lazy student of the Roland Empire Royal Magician's School. One day, the Roland Empire goes to war against a neighboring country Estabul, and Ryner loses his classmates in the battle. After the war, at Emperor Sion Astarl's command, Ryner sets out on a journey to find the relics of a "Legendary Hero". During his quest, he finds out that a deadly curse is spreading across the continent.
opening_theme: "Lament—Yagate Yorokobi o" (LAMENT~やがて喜びを~) by Aira Yuki (eps 1-12)
ending_theme: "Hikari no Filment" (光のフィルメント;The Filment of Light) by Ayahi Takagaki (eps 13-24)
